name: BikeOCD
description:
Balance your bike on a single wheel. Match the wheel color to the ground color and ride your way to victory.

- BikeOCD is small game where you control a twitchy physic based bike. 

-There are three ground types with unique colors. Based on the ground color, you have to balance your bike on a single wheel and navigate some tricky platforms.

- All movement is physics based.

- The game has six levels including a tutorial level.

- This was a two week project and it's my first complete game ever. Hope you enjoy it!

- Developed by Harsh Kashinath Istalkar (@HIstalkar)

- HOnramp Studios

- Game music by Alexey Kasyanchuk (DEgITx)  (Creative Comms 4.0)
